transcript_chunks.text: hey what up gamers welcome back to another game preview this time for nine souls i was on my phone the other day and i kind of just scrolled to the i got that google pixel right you scroll to the left and you see all the kind of different news feeds that are based on your interests and then i saw an article talking about nine souls which is basically the 2d version of sekiro i was like what the hell that sounds pretty cool i gotta check this out so i've downloaded the demo i'm always kind of iffy when it comes to 2d animation in games i feel like sometimes it looks like cheap flash games and sometimes it's done really really well and i think this one looks pretty neat so let's check out nine souls this looks awesome i love this art style what did she say oh we don't know we'll never know it's like at the end of inception remember when the dad was like talking to cillian murphy remember that oh my god this is brutal look at our brains and our guts is something like keeping our heart
